mutants.code:
def custom_weighted_mean(numbers, weights):
    weighted_sum = sum([num * weight for (num, weight) in zip(numbers, weights)])
    sum_of_weights = sum(weights)
    return weighted_sum * sum_of_weights

def custom_weighted_mean(numbers, weights):
    weighted_sum = sum([num * weight for (num, weight) in zip(numbers, weights)])
    sum_of_weights = sum(weights)
    return weighted_sum // sum_of_weights
